Text: Do You Realize??:  It reached #32 in the UK Singles Chart and was adopted as the Official Rock Song of Oklahoma from 2009 to April 2013.
Triplets:<Do You Realize??

Text: Do You Realize??:  The song was ranked #31 on Rolling Stone's "100 Best Songs of the 2000s".

Text: Do You Realize??:  Wayne Coyne also considers it to be the best song they've ever written.
